info.title: Schema of Azure Resource Management events published to Azure Event Grid via Azure Resource Notifications
info.description: Describes the schema of the Azure Resource Management events published to Azure Event Grid. This corresponds to the Data property of an EventGridEvent.

HealthResourcesAvailabilityStatusChanged.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.ResourceNotifications.HealthResources.AvailabilityStatusChanged event.

apiVersion.description: api version of the resource payload

id.description: id of the base resource whose availability status has been impacted

name.description: name of the resource whose availability status has been influenced

type.description: the type of the resource whose availability status has been impacted

properties.description: properties in the resource payload of the resource whose availability status has been impacted

HealthResourcesResourceAnnotatedEventDat.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for a Microsoft.ResourceNotifications.HealthResources.ResourceAnnotated event.

apiVersion.description: api version of the resource payload

ResourceInfoAboutResourceAnnotatedEvent.description: Resource information related to Annotation event

id.description: id of the base resource for which the annotation event is being emitted

name.description: name of the resource for which the annotation event is being emitted

type.description: the type of the resource for which the annotation event is being emitted

properties.description: properties in the resource payload of the resource whose availability status has been impacted
